named-query.name: City.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM City c WHERE c.idCity = :idCity

named-query.name: Client.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Client c WHERE c.idClient = :idClient

named-query.name: Department.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM Department d WHERE d.idDepartment = :idDepartment

named-query.name: Invoice.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.idInvoice = :idInvoice

named-query.name: Product.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.idProduct = :idProduct

named-query.name: Stock.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Stock s WHERE s.idStock = :idStock

named-query.name: Supplier.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Supplier s WHERE s.idSupplier = :idSupplier

named-query.name: Warehouse.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM Warehouse w WHERE w.idWarehouse = :idWarehouse
